author: Phil
content:
Nothing is zero carbon!
Most plastics are made from oil and chemicals. Batteries used carbon to make them.
ETC.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: The Seabin is a tad salty at 3.3K eurothingies. I can’t see your average Marina paying the equivalent of a one years berth fee for one and then having to persuade the staff to empty it twice a day. They don’t even bother to use a scoop net in the corner where all the waste collects which is essentially all this thing is doing. As they would say on Dragon’s Den: I’m out.
